mapper.select: select id, tenant_id, user_id, user_coupon_id, coupon_id, coupon_type, coupon_method, coupon_amount, use_vaild_date, use_expire_date, status, create_time, last_modified_time from market_user_coupon_info where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into market_user_coupon_info(tenant_id, user_id, user_coupon_id, coupon_id, coupon_type, coupon_method, coupon_amount, use_vaild_date, use_expire_date, status, create_time, last_modified_time) values (#{tenantId}, #{userId}, #{userCouponId}, #{couponId}, #{couponType}, #{couponMethod}, #{couponAmount}, #{useVaildDate}, #{useExpireDate}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{lastModifiedTime})

(#{entity.tenantId}, #{entity.userId}, #{entity.userCouponId}, #{entity.couponId}, #{entity.couponType}, #{entity.couponMethod}, #{entity.couponAmount}, #{entity.useVaildDate}, #{entity.useExpireDate}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.lastModifiedTime})

on duplicate key update tenant_id = values(tenant_id), user_id = values(user_id), user_coupon_id = values(user_coupon_id), coupon_id = values(coupon_id), coupon_type = values(coupon_type), coupon_method = values(coupon_method), coupon_amount = values(coupon_amount), use_vaild_date = values(use_vaild_date), use_expire_date = values(use_expire_date), status = values(status), create_time = values(create_time), last_modified_time = values(last_modified_time)

update market_user_coupon_info
tenant_id = #{tenantId},
user_id = #{userId},
user_coupon_id = #{userCouponId},
coupon_id = #{couponId},

where id = #{id}
